nio/Twitter Favorite Block.Description: A block that favorites tweets on Twitter.

id.description: identifier for specified tweet to favorite

Output.Description: None. The tweet with the correct `id` is favorited.

nio/Twitter Retweet Block.Description: A block that retweets posts on Twitter.

id.description: identifier for specified post to retweet

Output.Description: None. The post with the correct `id` is retweeted.

nio/Twitter Base Block.Description: Base block that connects to the Twitter REST API using OAuth.

nio/Twitter Post Block.Description: A block that posts a tweet to a Twitter account.

Output.Description: None. The `status` content is posted to Twitter.
